Modifications in the SOP for conciliation of disputes were further issued vide Policy no_ 2.1.27/2018 dated 18.07.2018 and 2.1.28/2018 dated 03.08.2018. 2 In order to expedite the conciliations, NHAI Board in its meeting held on 25.04.2019 (Agenda item no 138.05, has decided to form another Conciliation Committee of Independent Experts (CCIE-3). Accordingly, the following Conciliation and Settlement Committee has been constituted for the purpose:  Conciliation Committee of Independent Experts-3 (CCIE-3) S_ No_ Name of the Members Designation Sh._ Vijay Chhibber Retd: IAS (1978 MT Cadre) (Ti) Sh: B_ N.
